alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 17 at 3:29AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...STRONG WINDS ALONG INTERSTATE 80 IN SOUTH LARAMIE RANGE THROUGH 7 AM THIS MORNING... Early morning travelers can expect southwest winds of 30 to 35 mph sustained with gusts to 55 mph through 7 AM this morning. Those traveling on Interstate 25 near mile marker 4 south of Cheyenne and Interstate 80 over the Summit between Cheyenne and Laramie will likely experience these strong wind gusts. If traveling along Interstates 80 and 25 early this morning...be prepared for sudden strong wind gusts. Especially those in light and high profile vehicles including campers and tractor trailers.

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
